title: "Most skins will be 750 RP each!" - KateyKhaos on all the PBE Skins
body:
http://i.imgur.com/YN5BCLU.gifv

*I don't know how to feel about this.*

EDIT: See Katey's posts below. Definitely Not Udyr is getting bumped to 975 and Surprise Party Amumu is 975 at release as well (Price is 1350 normally)! My mistake!
